name: nudebomb
0:
”Alexa, open nude bomb”
”Alexa, start nude bomb”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nude bomb
des:
Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson.
The industrialized world looks like an ugly slum to the natural world, so ugly and a health hazard, that much like the Swede Hollow park, maybe the rest of the planet would restore all rivers and replace all industrialized habitats with natural arboretums and earth rises. Maybe the true skyline are the cloud plant collections of the Amazon Spheres.
Listen on to the story of a strong animal rights activist you name, who designs a nude bomb to prove the ugliness of the present humanity, in comparison to the beauty of the natural world.
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
